description: Allies are starting to change their tune as Israeli troops enter Gaza's largest hospital.
maintext: At the same time, we have seen a hardening of the international position around the Israeli offensive in the last few days with the US, the UK and France using language that is shifting the tone - perhaps summed up best by what US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said last weekend: "Far too many" Palestinian civilians have been killed.
title: Bowen: Al-Shifa Hospital raid comes as tone shifts on Israel
